/-- Proposition 11.7.1 -/
theorem not_integrable : BddOn f_9_3_21 (Icc 0 1) ‚àß ¬¨IntegrableOn f_9_3_21 (Icc 0 1) := by
  -- This proof is adapted from the structure of the original text.
  
  have hbdd : BddOn f_9_3_21 (Icc 0 1) := by use 1; intro x _; by_cases h : ‚àÉ y : ‚Ñö, y = x <;> simp [f_9_3_21, h]
  refine ‚ü®hbdd, ?_‚ü©
  have hsup (P : Partition (Icc 0 1)) : ‚àÄ J ‚àà P.intervals, (sSup (f_9_3_21 '' (J : Set ‚Ñù))) * |J|‚Çó = |J|‚Çó :=
    by
    intro J hJ; by_cases hJ0 : |J|‚Çó = 0
    . simp [hJ0]
    have hJ0' := hJ0
    rw [‚Üê length_of_subsingleton] at hJ0
    convert (one_mul _)
    apply le_antisymm
    . apply csSup_le
      . contrapose! hJ0; simp_all
      grind
    apply le_csSup_of_le _ _ (show (1 : ‚Ñù) ‚â§ 1 by norm_num)
    . rw [bddAbove_def]; use 1; grind
    simp at hJ0'; choose z hz hz' using Dense.exists_between (Rat.denseRange_cast (ùïú := ‚Ñù)) hJ0'
    simp at *; obtain ‚ü®q, rfl‚ü© := hz
    exact ‚ü®‚Üëq, (subset_iff _ _).mp (Ioo_subset J) (by simp [hz']), q, rfl‚ü©
  have hupper (P : Partition (Icc 0 1)) : upper_riemann_sum f_9_3_21 P = 1 :=
    by
    simp [upper_riemann_sum]
    calc
      _ = ‚àë J ‚àà P.intervals, |J|‚Çó := by apply Finset.sum_congr rfl; grind
      _ = _ := by simp [Partition.sum_of_length _ P]
  replace hupper : upper_integral f_9_3_21 (Icc 0 1) = 1 := by simp [upper_integ_eq_inf_upper_sum hbdd, hupper]
  have hinf (P : Partition (Icc 0 1)) : ‚àÄ J ‚àà P.intervals, (sInf (f_9_3_21 '' (J : Set ‚Ñù))) * |J|‚Çó = 0 :=
    by
    intro J hJ; by_cases hJ0 : |J|‚Çó = 0
    . simp [hJ0]
    have hJ0' := hJ0
    rw [‚Üê length_of_subsingleton] at hJ0
    convert (zero_mul _)
    apply le_antisymm
    . apply csInf_le_of_le _ _ (show (0 : ‚Ñù) ‚â§ 0 by norm_num)
      . rw [bddBelow_def]; use 0; grind
      simp at hJ0'
      choose z hz hz' using Dense.exists_between dense_irrational hJ0'
      simp at *
      refine ‚ü®z, (subset_iff _ _).mp (Ioo_subset J) (by simp [hz']), ?_‚ü©
      intro q; contrapose! hz; simp [‚Üê hz]
    apply le_csInf
    . contrapose! hJ0; simp_all
    grind
  have hlower (P : Partition (Icc 0 1)) : lower_riemann_sum f_9_3_21 P = 0 := by simp [lower_riemann_sum];
    calc
      _ = ‚àë J ‚àà P.intervals, (0 : ‚Ñù) := by apply Finset.sum_congr rfl; grind
      _ = _ := by simp
  replace hlower : lower_integral f_9_3_21 (Icc 0 1) = 0 := by simp [lower_integ_eq_sup_lower_sum hbdd, hlower]
  grind
